/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees, their leaves forming a natural canopy over the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
